name: animare
description: Light animation library based on requestanimationframe

scripts.publish: npm run build && npm run remove-devDep && (npm publish || echo 'publish failed!') && @Powershell Copy-item package-tmp.json package.json; Remove-Item package-tmp.json
scripts.publish-beta: npm run build && npm publish --tag beta
scripts.build: npm run build-ts && babel lib -d lib
scripts.remove-devDep: @Powershell Copy-item package.json package-tmp.json; npx json -f package.json -I -e '[delete this.devDependencies, delete this.scripts]'

author: Ahmed AlAbsi
